original_text: They were very afraid of what God had told them. God had said, ‘If even an animal touches the mountain, you must kill it with stones.’ They were very afraid of what God had told them. God had said, ‘If even an animal touches the mountain, you must kill it with stones.’
korean_text: 이는 짐승이라도 그 산에 들어가면 돌로 침을 당하리라 하신 명령을 그들이 견디지 못함이라

sentences.original_text: of what God had told them
If even an animal touches the mountain
you must kill it with stones
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그것을 돌로 쳐서 죽여야 한다

you must kill it with stones
